Trade/Device Name(s): On Call Sure Blood Glucose Monitoring System
On Call Sure Sync Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): On Call Sure Blood Glucose Meter
On Call Sure Sync Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for On Call Sure and On Call Sure Sync Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood using electrochemical detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by people with diabetes at home for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, and palm as an aid to monitor diabetes control; for single-patient use, not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or use on neonates.
